<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{
    content: {
      "application/x-www-form-urlencoded": {
        schema: {
          type: "object",
          properties: {
            client_id: { type: "string", example: "{CLIENT_ID}" },
            client_secret: { type: "string", example: "{CLIENT_SECRET}" },
            grant_type: { type: "string", example: "refresh_token" },
            refresh_token: {
              type: "string",
              example:
                "AQAh9kC9cF_Z8u3oCIO0PUl0vRbInlABV4wtmmcakBLMLPNHOd7ZLDeqXxyGlmPzKtNN_7b1L-JcxRJ6nm3r86QD7Nkreq3ZPOj51R5WzlF804T1LfRIbudzjjVPbDulcAQ",
            },
          },
        },
        examples: {
          "Access Token": {
            value: {
              client_id: "",
              client_secret: "",
              grant_type: "client_credentials",
            },
          },
          "Auth code flow": {
            value: {
              client_id: "",

  responses={{
    "200": {
      description: "Access Token[1 Hour] / Auth code flow / Refresh Token",
      headers: {
        "Alt-Svc": {
          schema: {
            type: "string",
            example: 'h3=":443"; ma=2592000,h3-29=":443"; ma=2592000',
          },
        },
        "Transfer-Encoding": { schema: { type: "string", example: "chunked" } },

          schema: { type: "string", example: "HTTP/2 edgeproxy, 1.1 google" },
        },

          schema: {
            type: "string",
            example: 'h3=":443"; ma=2592000,h3-29=":443"; ma=2592000',
          },
        },
        "content-encoding": { schema: { type: "string", example: "gzip" } },
        date: {
          schema: { type: "string", example: "Thu, 12 Jun 2025 11:10:34 GMT" },
        },

          schema: {
            type: "string",
            example: "2b579db2-7cad-4cb8-b94e-d4e25efa6f94",
          },
        },
        server: { schema: { type: "string", example: "envoy" } },

          schema: {
            type: "string",
            example:
              "sp_tr=false;Version=1;Domain=accounts.spotify.com;Path=/;Secure;SameSite=Lax",
          },
        },
        "sp-trace-id": {
          schema: { type: "string", example: "43ba8f5533bb1569" },
        },
        "strict-transport-security": {
          schema: { type: "string", example: "max-age=31536000" },
        },
        vary: { schema: { type: "string", example: "Accept-Encoding" } },

          schema: { type: "string", example: "nosniff" },
        },

          schema: { type: "string", example: "31" },
        },

        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            properties: {
              access_token: {
                type: "string",
                example:
                  "BQC2Kdqp_JK7kJtNoVSLOmw4c1wsqvVkrmCKJVOqoBviUgZ9JWGG2S9mIVYTgfAqJSyt_VXcz2dPhkDjaVDjB_Qjk0_tcsxSDCOQr1mZ5xXtfYy2bN-a17o2S4yyWGxP1CHa-nxujXM",

                type: "string",

              },
              scope: {
                type: "string",
                example:
                  "playlist-read-private playlist-read-collaborative ugc-image-upload user-follow-read playlist-modify-private user-read-email user-read-private user-modify-playback-state user-follow-modify user-library-read user-library-modify playlist-modify-public user-read-playback-state user-read-currently-playing user-read-recently-played user-read-playback-position user-top-read",
              },
              token_type: { type: "string", example: "Bearer" },
            },
          },
          examples: {
            "Access Token[1 Hour]": {
              value: {
                access_token:
